tuv.seg: Tax reliefs for people with a visual impairment
Faoisimh chánach do dhaoine a bhfuil lagú radhairc orthu
If you have certain visual impairments you may claim a reduction in the amount of tax that you pay
Má tá laigí áirithe radhairc ort is féidir leat laghdú a éileamh sa mhéid cánach a bhfuil ort a íoc
Under the tax system, the amount of tax that you pay to the Revenue Commissioners may be reduced by a system of tax credits and reliefs
Faoi chóras cánach na hÉireann, is féidir méid na cánach a íocann tú leis na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim a laghdú trí chóras creidmheasanna agus faoiseamh cánach
You can read about how your tax is calculated for an explanation of how they work
Is féidir leat a léamh faoi conas a ríomhtar do cháin le míniúchán a fháil faoin dóigh a n-oibríonn siad
If you have certain visual impairments you can claim the Blinds Person’s Tax Credit
Má tá aon lagú radhairc ort is féidir leat Creidmheas Cánach an Duine Daill a éileamh
If you have a guide dog, you can apply for the Guide Dog Allowance
Má tá madra treorach agat is féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh le haghaidh Liúntas Madra Treorach
In addition, refunds are available for Value Added Tax that is paid on certain aids and appliances
Lena chois sin, tá aisíocaíochtaí ar fáil don Cháin BhreisLuacha a íoctar ar roinnt áiseanna agus fearais
Blind Person’s Tax Credit
Creidmheas Cánach Duine Daill
The Blind Person’s Tax Credit is €1,650 for 2017
Is é Creidmheas Cánach an Duine Daill do 2017 ná €1,650
For a married couple or civil partners (where both spouses or civil partners are blind), the credit is €3,300
Do lánúin phósta nó páirtnéiri sibhialta (má tá an bheirt chéilí dall), is é €3,300 an creidmheas do 2017
Parents cannot claim a Blind Person’s Tax Credit in respect of any children who are blind, but you can claim the Incapacitated Child Tax Credit
Ní féidir le tuismitheoirí creidmheas cánach duine daill a éileamh maidir le haon leanaí atá dall ach is féidir leis na tuismitheoirí Creidhmeas Cánach Linbh faoi Éagumas a éileamh
To apply for the Blind Person's Tax Credit, you must have a certificate from an opthalmic surgeon (a physician who performs eye surgery)
Chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar Chreidmheas Cánach an Duine Daill, caithfidh tú teastas a bheith agat ó mháinlia oftalmach (lia a dhéanann máinliacht súl)
The certificate must state:
Caithfidh go ndeir an teastas:
• That your best vision does not exceed 6/60 visual acuity in the better eye with corrective lenses or
• Nach bhfuil an radharc is fearr atá agat níos fearr ná géire radhairc de 6/60 sa tsúil is fearr le lionsaí ceartaitheacha
• That the widest diameter of your visual field subtends an angle no greater than 20 degrees
• Go dtéann an trastomhas is leithne de do réimse radhairc uillinn nach mó ná 20 céim
The certificate issued by your ophthalmic surgeon should state whether the visual impairment is permanent, or temporary
Ba chóir don teastas a eisíonn do mháinlia oftalmach a rá an bhfuil an lagú radhairc buan, nó sealadach
If it is temporary, you will need a certificate for each year for which the credit is claimed
Má tá sé sealadach, beidh teastas de dhíth ort do gach bliain a n-éilítear creidmheas di
Otherwise the tax credit remains indefinitely
Mura bhfuil, beidh an creidmheas cánach i bhfeidhm gan teorainn ama
An additional allowance is available if you, or your spouse, have a trained guide dog
Tá liúntas breise ar fáil má tá madra treorach oilte agatsa, nó ag do chéile
(Guide dogs are especially trained to lead blind or visually impaired people around obstacles)
(Oiltear madraí treorach go speisialta chun daoine dalla nó daoine a bhfuil laige radhairc orthu a threorú thart ar bhacainní)
In 2017 the allowance is €825 and you claim it at the standard rate of 20%
I 2017, is é €825 an liúntas agus beidh sé i bhfeidhm ag an ráta cánach is airde atá agat
To claim the allowance you must have a letter from Irish Guide Dogs for the Blind confirming that you are a registered owner
Leis an liúntas a éileamh, caithfidh tú litir a bheith agat ó Mhadraí Treorach na hÉireann ag dearbhú gur úinéir cláraithe thú
Value Added Tax (VAT) Refunds
Aisíocaíochtaí Cánach Breisluacha (CBL)

Refunds can be claimed from Revenue for VAT paid on certain aids and appliances designed to help a blind person cope with daily functions, for example, specially adapted computer equipment, Braille books, Braille writing equipment, etc

Is féidir aisíocaíochtaí a éileamh ó Ioncam as CBL a íoctar ar roinnt áiseanna agus fearas a dearadh le cuidiú le duine dall déileáil le feidhmeanna laethúla, mar shampla, trealamh ríomhaireachta a bhfuil sainoiriúnú déanta air, leabhair Braille, trealamh scríbhneoireachta Braille, srl
See VAT refunds on aids and appliances used by people with disabilities for more information
Féach aisíocaíochtaí CBL ar áiseanna agus fhearais a úsáideann daoine a bhfuil míchumais orthus le níos mó faisnéise a fháil
To apply fill in a claim form for the Blind Person’s Tax Credit and Guide Dog Allowance (pdf)
Is féidir foirm éilimh do Chreidmheas Cánach na nDaoaine Dalla agus Liúntas na Madraí Treorach (pdf) a íoslódáil
You can also claim tax credits online through PAYE Anytime which is available through Revenue's myAccount service
Nó más mian leat is féidir leat an fhoirm a líonadh ar an scáileán agus é a phriontáil ansin
Completed application forms should be returned to your local tax office
Ba chóir foirmeacha iarratais chríochnaithe a chur ar ais chuig d’oifig áitiúil chánach
Lo-call telephone numbers for your regional tax office is available here
Uimhreacha teileafóin lóghlao do d’oifig réigiúnach cánach ar fáil anseo
